sentences.en: A monument was erected to the memory of that great scientist.
sentences.cn: 树立了一块纪念碑纪念那位伟大的科学家.

sentences.en: A scientist never presupposes the truth of an unproved fact.
sentences.cn: 科学家从不预先假定未经证实的事实.

sentences.en: As a scientist,he disbelieves in Jesus.
sentences.cn: 作为一名科学家，他不信耶稣。

sentences.en: He is a scientist of high prestige.
sentences.cn: 他是一位有声望的科学家。

sentences.en: He is routinely described as the greatest scientist since Einstein.
sentences.cn: 他通常被认为是继爱因斯坦之后最伟大的科学家。

sentences.en: I admired him as a true scientist and hard worker.
sentences.cn: 我钦佩他是个真正的科学家和勤奋工作的人。

sentences.en: In the middle of his tests, the scientist burst on the truth.
sentences.cn: 在实验过程中, 那个科学家突然发现了真知.

sentences.en: It doesn't take a rocket scientist to make a rock record.
sentences.cn: 制作摇滚唱片并不要求你非得绝顶聪明。

sentences.en: Scientists say they've already collected more data than had been expected.
sentences.cn: 科学家们说他们已经搜集到比预期更多的数据。

sentences.en: Seek for an experienced scientist to fill the post.
sentences.cn: 找一位有经验的科学家来担当此职.

sentences.en: the cartoon figure of the mad scientist working in his laboratory
sentences.cn: 疯狂的科学家在实验室工作的卡通形象

sentences.en: The scientist abandoned his research for lack of fund.
sentences.cn: 由于缺乏资金,这位科学家放弃了他的研究工作.

sentences.en: The scientist broke fresh ground in his recent book about physics.
sentences.cn: 这位科学家在他最近的物理学著作中提出了新的见解.

sentences.en: The scientist denied himself many of the comforts of life.
sentences.cn: 这位科学家放弃了生活上的许多享受.

sentences.en: The scientist elucidated his theory by three simple demonstrations.
sentences.cn: 这位科学家以三个简单的实例来说明他的理论.

sentences.en: The scientist thirsts after an achievement.
sentences.cn: 这名科学家渴望取得成就。

sentences.en: The scientist's experiments gave birth to a new drug.
sentences.cn: 那位科学家的实验产生了一种新药.

sentences.en: This scientist accessed enormous different files to find the correct information.
sentences.cn: 这位科学家在计算机上调阅了大量的不同文件以找寻所要的信息.

sentences.en: We are expecting the arrival of an eminent scientist.
sentences.cn: 我们正期待一位著名科学家的来访.
